'''David Lodge''' is an American actor.

==Roles==
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king]]'': Rider of Rohan
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'': Rohan General, Battalion Leader, villagers
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]'': [[Grishnakh]], Rohan Captain, Monster Warrior
